named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.readAll
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTask( task.id,task.name,task.taskData ) FROM TaskImpl task

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.readByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTask( task.id,task.name,task.taskData ) FROM TaskImpl task WHERE task.taskData.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.readByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTask( task.id,task.name,task.taskData ) FROM TaskImpl task WHERE task.taskData.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.readByProcessIdByActualOwnerId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTask( task.id,task.name,task.taskData ) FROM TaskImpl task WHERE task.taskData.processId = :processId AND task.taskData.actualOwner.id = :actualOwnerId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.readByProcessInstanceIdByActualOwnerId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTask( task.id,task.name,task.taskData ) FROM TaskImpl task WHERE task.taskData.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId AND task.taskData.actualOwner.id = :actualOwnerId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.readByProcessInstanceIdByActualOwnerIdByStatus
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTask( task.id,task.name,task.taskData ) FROM TaskImpl task WHERE task.taskData.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId AND task.taskData.actualOwner.id = :actualOwnerId AND task.taskData.status = :status

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.countByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(task) FROM TaskImpl task WHERE task.taskData.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.countByProcessInstanceId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.countByProcessInstanceIdByActualOwnerId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTask.countByProcessInstanceIdByActualOwnerIdByStatus
